Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Fancy Dress Party
Episodes.Plot: Lucy doesn't have anything to wear to the party.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Pied Piper
Episodes.Plot: It's the Rocket's 100th birthday and everyone prepares a dish to bring to a potluck picnic. Pat and Ted organize a surprise firework display to celebrate the great occasion.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat The Secret SuperHero
Episodes.Plot: Postman Pat and his cat Jess deliver the mail to residents of Greendale; Charlie is eager to see a superhero in Greendale but can't find one; the letters fall out of the truck and Pat attempts retrieve them.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat Goes Undercover
Episodes.Plot: Pat and Jeff take the children camping; Tom is apprehensive but ends up both enjoying himself and being helpful, particularly when the tents are blown away in a storm.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Bowling Buddies
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Ajay compete to be Pat's bowling partner for a friends bowling night on the village green; Pat tells them that he's Sarah's partner and they decided to team up together.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Magic Lamp
Episodes.Plot: The children make a wish that they regret.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Sneaky Sheep
Episodes.Plot: The children offer to help their parents with chores but all their hard work weeding and tidying up is destroyed by a mysterious visitor.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Island Shipwreck
Episodes.Plot: Ted saves the day when Pat's boat trip goes wrong.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Grand Custard Race
Episodes.Plot: The adults have a messy custard race, which ends with Pat covered in custard; Postman Pat learns that taking part is more important than winning.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Lucky Escape
Episodes.Plot: Pat and the Reverend are accidentally locked in the vestry; while PC Selby and the others chase after Dr. Gilbertson to retrieve the vestry key, Pat and Reverend Timms find a way to escape.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Record Breaking Day
Episodes.Plot: Ajay bets Pat that he can't deliver all the mail by teatime and the loser has to run around Greendale in their pajamas; the kids are enjoying a different sort of math lesson by counting and breaking records for skipping.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Missing Things
Episodes.Plot: PC Selby has a busy day when Jess, Mabel the sheep and the Greendale Rocket go missing; helped by Pat, he finds them in the Greendale Tunnel, where clever Jess stopped the train before it hit a trapped Mabel.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Flying Post
Episodes.Plot: Ted ties helium balloons to Pat's postbag, and it goes flying off into the air; Ted uses his one man hover-backpack to reach the bag and pop the balloons.
